name: MS.PAC-MAN
description: Single Player, 5.1 Surround Sound, HD (High Definition). Buy the full version of Ms. PAC-MAN, the sequel to the world-renowned Pac-Man, now featuring 2 Warp Tunnels to move through. Also, the fruits which appear are no longer stationary! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
